feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Business One
feed.subtitle: SAP Business One Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Will Removal of XSLT from the browser affect B1if ?
entry.content: Chrome decided to deprecate and remove XSLT from the browser on the near future ( Removing XSLT for a more secure browser  ). It looks like Firefox thinking the same way. Does these affect SAP Business One Integration Framework ?

entry.title: Period-End Closing (PEC) utility posting to Main Branch instead of individual branches - SAP B1
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We are using SAP Business One 10.0 SP 2505 with the Multiple Branches feature enabled. We are encountering an issue with how the Period-End Closing utility handles branch-specific balances.

The Issue

When running the Period-End Closing utility, we selected All Branches in the selection criteria. The system successfully generated the two standard Journal Entries:

  1. Closing Entry: P&L Accounts > Period-End Closing Account.

  2. Final Entry: Period-End Closing Account > Retained Earnings Account.

The Problem: Both Journal Entries were automatically assigned to the Main Branch.

The Impact on Reporting

  • Consolidated Trial Balance: Shows the correct zeroed-out balances for P&L accounts.

  • Individual Branch Trial Balance: When we run the TB for a specific sub-branch, the P&L accounts still show balances because the closing JEs were posted to the Main Branch instead of the sub-branch.

Questions for the Community

  1. Is it a requirement to run the Period-End Closing utility separately for each individual branch to ensure the JEs are tagged with the correct Branch ID?

  2. Is there a setting in G/L Account Determination or Branch Setup that allows a single PEC run to "split" the resulting JEs by branch automatically?

  3. If we must run it branch-by-branch, what is the best practice for the Retained Earnings account—should we have a separate RE account per branch, or is one central account standard?

Any advice on the standard workflow for multi-branch period-end closing would be very helpful.

entry.title: Purchase Order Budget Exceed Error in Approval Process
entry.content:
Hello,

We are trying to implement Purchase Order approval based on monthly budget addon in SAP Business One (SQL Server) using Approval Procedures.

The approval should trigger when:

  • PO exceeds monthly budget

  • Budget is based on Project + Cost Center +GL +Category)

    Query:

    SELECT
    CASE
    WHEN $[$39.2.12] >
    ISNULL(
    (
    SELECT
    CASE DATEPART(MONTH, $[$39.10.1])
    WHEN 1 THEN U_JanMon
    WHEN 2 THEN U_FebMon
    WHEN 3 THEN U_MarMon
    WHEN 4 THEN U_AprMon
    WHEN 5 THEN U_MayMon
    WHEN 6 THEN U_JunMon
    WHEN 7 THEN U_JulMon
    WHEN 8 THEN U_AugMon
    WHEN 9 THEN U_SepMon
    WHEN 10 THEN U_OctMon
    WHEN 11 THEN U_NovMon
    WHEN 12 THEN U_DecMon
    END
    FROM [@BUD1]
    WHERE DocEntry =
    (
    SELECT DocEntry
    FROM [@OBUD]
    WHERE U_PrjCode = $[$39.1.8]
    AND U_CostCenter = $[$39.1.9]
    )
    ),
    0)
    THEN 'TRUE'
    ELSE 'FALSE'
    END

    After saving this query in the Query Manager and assigning it in Approval Terms → Terms Based on User Queries, when I add a Purchase Order that exceeds the budget, the system throws the error:
    “Could not commit transaction: Error -1 detected during transaction '' (ECM5).”

    Budget Addon Screen:

entry.title: Item Cost of Finished Goods based on Purity of Raw Material
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have encountered a business scenario where the cost of Finished Goods items is determined based on the purity of the Raw Material. However, in SAP Business One, the cost of the Raw Material is directly carried forward to the Finished Goods without considering purity.

This is causing a difference in gross profit at the item level in AR Invoice/Delivery.

Could you please confirm if there is any SAP standard solution available to handle this requirement?

Looking forward to your guidance.

entry.title: SAP B1 Import Special Prices
entry.content:
Hi,
I am trying to import volume pricing and keep getting DTW errors.
I have the following:
Item      Quantity        Price
ABC1    1                     $50.00
ABC1    100                $40.00
ABC1    200                $30.00

I looked at ITM1, OSPP, SPP1 and SPP2 templates but I am getting errors with DTW and of course they are not understandable errors.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: SLD, License and Extension Manager Error Installing SAP Business One 10.0 SP2511
entry.content:
Hello dear Experts,
I am encountering this problem during the installation of SAP Business One SP2511 on a Windows Server 2019 environment, SQL Server 2022 with SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS.
.Net 4.8
ODBC 18
These components are missing:

SLD, license manager, extension manager
Data interface server
Job service
Workflow service
Mobile service

entry.title: Remove a month in posting period after posting a transaction in SAP Business one for new Fiscal year
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

 I am looking for opinion for the below scenario in SAP Business One.

A new fiscal year for 2026 is expected to be created with 12 months from January to December 2026. But January 2026 month was created in Fiscal year 2025 in posting period incorrectly and a transaction has been posted in January 2026. How to nullify January 2026 posting and able to delete January 2026 month in fiscal year 2025 posting period?

If we reverse the transaction in January 2026, will that assist in this scenario? Or is there any other possibility to rescue in this case?

Regards,

BS

entry.title: SSL connection to SAP B1 Integration framework from Postman
entry.content:
Please help with the configuration of the SSL connection to SAP B1 Integration framework on the dedicated server.

On the same server already installed service layer with the CA certificate and it works good.

We have also test version of integration framework and it works through HTTP.

But during Postman connection to the dedicated server from this server itself we receive error: XCL199 Authentication required

During connection we receive error in IPO (B1.CCC.APICaller): XCE188 Keystore or truststore not found

HTTPS connection to the site goes without SSL errors.

Please suggest what else can be checked.

Postman request:

POST https://<hostname>:8443/B1iXcellerator/exec/soap/vP.001sap0003.in_WCSX/com.sap.b1i.vplatform.runtime/INB_WS_CALL_SYNC_XPT/INB_WS_CALL_SYNC_XPT.ipo/proc

201 ms

entry.title: No existe tabla 'Tablas de usuario' (OUTB) (ODBC -2004) [Mensaje 131-183]
entry.content:
Por medio de la presente, nos dirigimos a ustedes para solicitar su apoyo con un caso que se viene presentando en SAP Business One. en versión 10.0

Actualmente, no es posible acceder a la consulta “Lista de partidas abiertas” desde las siguientes rutas:

  • Ventas – Clientes – Informe de ventas – Lista de partidas abiertas
  • Compras – Proveedores – Informe de compras – Lista de partidas abiertas

Al intentar acceder, el sistema muestra el siguiente mensaje de error: No existe tabla 'Tablas de usuario' (OUTB) (ODBC -2004) [Mensaje 131-183]

entry.title: We have setup bank account to All currencies. And want to change to one currency. How to move data?
entry.content: We recently went live with SAP B1, and have setup our bank accounts to All currencies. But later realised the mistake we did. Now we want to retrieve the setup from all currencies to just one currency on each bank. How to move the balances from old bank to new bank setup?.

entry.title: Licnese Service not generating HK on AWS EC2 win2022 , SBO 10.0 SP2511 , mssql 2019
entry.content:
SAP Business One License Service not generating Hardware Key (HK) on AWS EC2

We are facing an issue where the SAP Business One License Service does not generate a Hardware Key (HK).

Environment details:

  • SAP Business One: 10.0 SP 2511

  • Database: MS SQL Server 2019

  • OS: Windows Server 2022

  • Infrastructure: AWS EC2

The License Service starts successfully, but no HK is generated, preventing license assignment.

Has anyone encountered this issue on AWS EC2 / virtualized environments, especially with Windows Server 2022?
Are there specific prerequisites, patches, or AWS-related configurations required for HK generation?

Any insights or guidance would be appreciated.

entry.title: Price difference in Manual Goods receipt
entry.content:
Dear Team,
We have created a receipt from Production in which the material was not issued, but the receipt from Production was completed. In this case, the item cost is showing as zero in the document, and no Journal Entry was passed. The item is managed by batch, and the valuation method is Batch/Serial.
Subsequently, we made a Goods Issue with the same batch. Since the batch cost was zero, no Journal Entry was passed.
Later, we created a Manual Goods Receipt for the same batch number with a cost of INR 63.48 and the same issued quantity (2000). When the manual goods receipt was posted, the item cost was correctly captured. However, in the Journal Entry, 50% of the amount was posted to the Price Difference account, and the batch cost is showing as INR 31.74.
Could you please guide us on the reason for this behavior?

entry.title: SAP B1 Service Layer: Can I pick/confirm Pick List by a single Batch (and Bin) like in UI?
entry.content:
Hi,

 

I’m working on SAP Business One (HANA, WMS, bin-managed warehouse) and I need to confirm (pick) quantities in a Pick List per single batch number (and bin location), exactly like it is shown in the SAP UI.

 

Example from UI:

 

  • Pick List line has released quantity 308

  • It is split into 4 batch numbers / bins:

     

    • PAL263133 → 77 qty → Bin MH4-R06-27-A

    • PAL263170 → 77 qty → Bin MH4-R05-11-A

    • PAL263232 → 77 qty → Bin MH4-R01-01-A

    • PAL263251 → 77 qty → Bin MH4-R05-05-A

     

 

 

What I need is an API call that allows me to pick only one specific batch, e.g.:

 

✅ Pick only 10 or 77 from batch PAL263133 (and its bin),

without automatically picking the remaining batches/bins for the same item or other lines.

 

 

DI API situation

 

 

With DI API it is complicated — updating PickLists.Lines.PickedQuantity + BatchNumbers does not work correctly for bin-managed warehouses. The correct flow seems to be GetReleasedAllocation / UpdateReleasedAllocation, but this easily updates more allocations than intended.

 

 

My question

 

 

Does Service Layer API support confirming/picking Pick List quantities per single batch number and bin location?

 

Specifically:

 

  1. Is there an endpoint to update Pick List released allocations (PKL2) like the UI does?

  2. Can I update Pick List picking quantities for only one batch/bin row, without affecting other PKL2 rows?

  3. If yes, what is the correct payload / endpoint (PickLists, PickListsLines, PickListBinAllocations etc.)?

 

 

Any guidance or example would be appreciated.

 

Thanks!

entry.title: SAP B1 SP 2411, how to log in as different user
entry.content:
Hello,

In older versions I could log in as another user to check their settings, by typing in a username and password.
In version 2411 login is via SSO.
How can I log in as another user, if I know their username and password?

Thank you in advance,

Marina Levy

entry.title: Stored procedure with a Temp table output fields not visible in crystal report
entry.content:
I have a legacy crystal report that I need to modify . The report is based on a single stored procedure. The proc simply inserts data into a  temp table ( eg  #TempTable01)  and does a select * from  #TempTable01 at the end and also does a drop table .

This is currently working ,  if I extract the Crystal report for editing I can see the fields.

HOWEVER,  if I change the connection in design time ( I need to make some modifications so...) , 

the moment I change the connection the fields disappear from the field explorer.  Removing and re-adding the proc to the report has not helped.

This is a SQL Server based report and I have only tried OLEDB ADO.

entry.title: Inventory Audit Report Performance Issue – Extremely Long Runtime / Timeouts (SAP Business One)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am looking for assistance with a performance issue related to the Inventory Audit Report in SAP Business One.

System Landscape

  • SAP Business One Version: 10.0 FP 2405

  • Database: Microsoft SQL Server 2019

  • Database Size: ~57 GB

  • Server OS: Microsoft Windows Server 2019 Standard

  • Server Deployment: Cloud

  • Client Type: SAP Business One Windows Client

Issue Description

The client is experiencing very long execution times when running the standard Inventory Audit Report.

  • The report takes an excessive amount of time to load and frequently times out.

  • This behavior occurs even when running the report for a single day.

  • Due to the long runtime and timeout behavior, the report is effectively unusable.

  • The issue is consistent and reproducible.

Additional Observations

  • No customizations or modifications have been made to the standard Inventory Audit Report.

  • The issue occurs regardless of the user executing the report.

  • Other inventory-related reports execute normally or significantly faster in comparison.

  • Although the database contains historical inventory data, the issue still occurs with very small date ranges.

Business Impact

The Inventory Audit Report is required for:

  • Inventory reconciliation

  • Audit and compliance activities

  • Historical stock movement validation

At this time, the client cannot rely on this report due to the performance limitations.

Request for Assistance

We would appreciate guidance on:

  • Known performance issues with the Inventory Audit Report in SAP Business One 10 FP 2405

  • SAP Notes or known corrections related to this report

  • Recommended configuration or best practices to improve performance

  • Whether this behavior has been addressed in later Feature Packs or patches

Any insights, recommendations, or shared experiences would be highly appreciated.

Thank you

entry.title: Add new Data SPP1 and SPP2 Dtw
entry.content:
Hello together,

I wanna add some new data for special prices, in detail SPP1 and SPP2.  Adding the SPP1 prices is no problem, but with SPP2 Dtw says "Update Failed A00001,C20000 Invalid value in quantity field Invalid value in quantity field 65171". But Quantity seems fine. Any Ideas what causes this?
